metadata.name: Qiqing Sodium Hypochlorite Disinfectant 6 g 100mL Liquid

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for over the counter use as a disinfectant agent in the sodium hypochlorite form

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50 of sodium hypochlorite in an acute oral toxicity study was 5800 mg kg in mouse MSDS
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sodium hypochlorite exerts antimicrobial actions that depends on the concentration of the available chlorine and the pH of the solution A32999 The concentration of the hypochlorite depends on the overall efficiency of disinfection A32999
